thread.title: Great location, great staff!!
thread.title_full: Great location, great staff!! - Review of Hotel Duo, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Lea A
title: Great location, great staff!!
text: I had a stay at hotel Duo for two nights. Location was unbeatable, comfortable beds, good breakfast but what made my stay superb was the really friendly and helpful staff, especially Fred. They actually helped me with different requirements and made my stay in Paris wonderful. Hope to come back!!
